articles.author: ASHOK SHARMA Associated Press
articles.title: Ratan Tata, former chairman of Indian conglomerate Tata Group, dies at age 86 - ABC News
articles.description: Ratan Tata, one of India’s most influential business leaders, has been cremated after a state funeral in the country’s financial capital
articles.content: NEW DELHI -- Ratan Tata, one of Indias most influential business leaders, was cremated after a state funeral in the countrys financial capital on Thursday. The veteran industrialist, former chairman … [+5223 chars]
